contentList.content: The wearer has less than full health, they have an additional bonus action.
<LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">Cantrips</LSTag> that cost an action cost a bonus action instead. This effect can be used once per battle.
During combat, when the creature starts their turn with less than full health, they gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_VIOLENCE">Wrath</LSTag> for 1 turn.
Set yourself on fire to gain Heat. This damage can't be resisted out of combat.
When the wielder has less than full health, they deal an additional [1].
You are <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with this Shield while using it.
You have Advantage when casting Guiding Bolt, but it no longer applies <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GUIDING_BOLT">Guiding Bolt</LSTag>.
Once per battle, you can use your staff to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_MAG_FireBolt_Staff">Fire Bolt</LSTag> using a bonus action instead of an action.
Once per battle, you can use your staff to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_MAG_RayOfFrost_Staff">Ray of Frost</LSTag> using a bonus action instead of an action.
Once per battle, you can use your staff to cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_MAG_EldritchBlast_Staff">Eldritch Blast</LSTag> using a bonus action instead of an action.
